p: All chemicals and reagents were of analytical grade. Folinâ€“Ciocalteu phenol reagent, sodium carbonate, gallic acid, porcine pancreatic lipase, 4-methylumbelliferone, phosphate buffer saline, sodium citrate, orlistat, taurocholic acid, p-nitrophenylbutyrate (p-NPB), sodium phosphate buffer, sodium chloride, porcine pancreatic cholesterol esterase, simvastatin, cholesterol, oleic acid, phosphatidylcholine, methanol, and taurocholate salt were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO).
